reviewText: Real good early TV. I wish the shows were longer, but what you get is very good. This could have been as good as The Thin Man had it been given more attention.

These are Old School Mysteries, but they are still fun to watch.  We received quickly.  The 4 stars is just because it is terrible quality of picture; the studios are not fixing these and making them look better and sound better, but still fun to watch.
How simple the old plots were.  It brings back memories when TV as meant to entertain with our foul language and violence.
I've loved this show since I was a kid, along with Topper and I Love Lucy, but remember - it's old.  It's not 2-1/2 Men or CSI, so if you're not into the old stuff, pass this by.
